levels.description: Seeks the closest enemy around and launches <@ba.vup>{times}</> slashes in a row, each dealing <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage and <$ba.stun>Stunning</> the target on the last hit for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds
